rules_text:
Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
When Fifth Street Patronage enters, create two 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.
As long as you’re in a renaissance, Actors, Artists, Bards, Citizens, Nobles, and Peasants you control get +1/+1.
